law.catch_line: Maintenance Of Vacant Properties And Enforcement Of Vacant Property Maintenance Requirements.
law.full_text:
MAINTENANCE OF VACANT PROPERTIES AND ENFORCEMENT OF VACANT PROPERTY MAINTENANCE REQUIREMENTS.
If a property subject to this section is found to be vacant, the provisions of Article 8, Division 7 (Section 98.0701, et seq.), and all maintenance and security requirements described therein, shall apply. Enforcement by the Los Angeles Department of Building and Safety shall be pursuant to the provisions of Article 8, Division 7.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
MAINTENANCE OF VACANT PROPERTIES AND ENFORCEMENT OF VACANT PROPERTY MAINTENANCE REQUIREMENTS. (§ 164.06)
MAINTENANCE OF VACANT PROPERTIES AND ENFORCEMENT OF VACANT PROPERTY MAINTENANCE REQUIREMENTS. If a property subject to this section is found to be vacant, the provisions of Article 8, Division 7 (Section 98.0701, et seq.), and all maintenance and security requirements described therein, shall apply. Enforcement by the Los Angeles Department of Building and Safety shall be pursuant to the provisions of Article 8, Division 7.
